name: Version Story
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA
long_description:
Version Story organizes a document's history and generates comparisons in a way that is simple and intuitive. It is built to fit seamlessly into your workflow.

Lawyers, publishers, content creators, academic researchers, documentation-writers, and ops teams use Version Story to compare, track, and merge documents with ease.

Version Story supports comparisons and merging of multiple Word (.doc, .docx), Google Docs, and PDF files.
